revision.text:
{{codepointer|r=Strife|Classic attack}} '''A_BurnArea'''
(''no parameter'')
Performs a radius attack with 128 damage and a 128 radius. Basically the same as the following: BNG3 B 2 Bright [[A_Explode]] (128, 128) This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|PhosphorousFire}} and derived classes.
